instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.A1706: What is A1706? A1706 is a model number for a 13 inch size MacBook Pro Retina from years 2016, Mid 2017 with EMC 3071, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-00239, 820-00923..

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1706</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> Touchbar , touchbar not active.
threads.message:
Hi i have an issue with <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1706</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> 13" 2016 Mac Pro. When installing Os it get to a point where it says "A critical software update is required for your mac, but an error was encountered" it just goes back to that. The touchbar doesnt seem to be working. I have inspected the board but cannot see any sign of spillage. It only works when internal video cable is removed then it boots into Os with touchbar working and video external
Would the screen/webcam be the issue or cable?

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1706</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> Touchbar , touchbar not active.
threads.message:
ALS failure.
On these machines, you also lose webcam feature.
Disconnect the small connector for webcam and you can use internal LCD.

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1706</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> Touchbar , touchbar not active.
threads.message:
Thank you, what does Als mean?

Is there a recall program for this issue?

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1706</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> Touchbar , touchbar not active.
threads.message:
Ambient Light Sensor, installed in the webcam board.
No recall program for this :(

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1706</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> Touchbar , touchbar not active.
threads.message: And definitely not anything to do with <CHIP>U3900</CHIP>?

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1706</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> Touchbar , touchbar not active.
threads.message:
No :(
I try disabling only ALS lines, but macOS reports webcam error then...
